response.original_title: What Should I Do If My Lot polish Airlines Cancellation Fails?
response.overview: Cancellation Timeframes Explained {US}+1 888 319 2392 or UK: +44 (800) 0478 382 Timing is everything when it comes to Lot polish Airlines Cancellation. {US}+1 888 319 2392 or UK: +44 (800) 0478 382  Many airlines permit cancellation within 24 hours of booking if the flight departs at least seven days later. {US}+1 888 319 2392 or UK: +44 (800) 0478 382  After that window, standard fare rules usually apply. {US}+1 888 319 2392 or UK: +44 (800) 0478 382
